description:
### LastDigit

The task is to create a function that determines the last digit of a^b. The function will receive two integers (a and b) and return a single integer - the last digit of a^b.

Input: Two integers, a and b (0 <= a, b <= 1_000_000)
Output: An integer representing the last digit of a^b.

Example:

```js lastDigit(2, 5) // 2 ```
